You are the decider. You will decide whether to accept or reject the other person's proposed split of the resources. Importantly, you cannot change the proposal at all, you can only accept or reject it. The proposal is outlined here: Dear esteemed decider, it is with the utmost respect and admiration that I present this humble proposal. We are fortunate to have a grand total of 27 magnificent blankets. It would be an honor for the proposer to receive just 1 of these, a mere token compared to the bounty that awaits you. As the decider, you are entitled to the lion's share, a staggering 26 of these blankets. Your generosity in accepting this proposal is deeply appreciated.  
If you accept, you get the amount proposed in the proposal. If you reject, you both get nothing at all. Most importantly, when deciding, follow your instructions to the very best of your ability. Please answer in one word: accept or reject.
